name: The Alchemist (itch) (The Icehouse, LuminyStudios)
description:
The Alchemist is a short interactive project originally created to celebrate the Icehouse 5th anniversary. This experience features high quality realistic graphics. The room to visit is like a museum where you can find references to games created by members and friends of our collective...

This "game" has remained private for more than a year. We decided to reveal it to the public in order to show the work of Juanjo Barcelo Molina, the creator behind The Alchemist.

There is no ending, you can explore the room at your own pace and enjoy the environment while searching for the works of our artists as long as you want!

If you like this experience, take a look at the new project of Juanjo at Luminy Studios: The Dark Bones, Horror Anthology (chapter 1), available for free on Halloween 2021! Learn more:
https://www.luminystudios.com/the-dark-bones.html

The game is delivered as is and will not receive any updates.

The Alchemist | basic controls:

WASD - Move the character

MOUSE - Move the camera

Mouse Right Button - Zoom

Follow the screen messages to interact.

NOTE:

If your computer is not very powerful, select a medium/low quality setting to benefit from a more fluid experience.

Thanks for playing and enjoy!

HAPPY 5TH ANNIVERSARY TO THE ICEHOUSE!!
